Name: Outsider Strategist～異世界で軍師になる～
About the game: An orthodox tactical RPG with a story length of over 400,000 Japanese letters! Comes with full voice acting (in Japanese) to emphasize the story. How fun would it be, if I could succeed as a strategist in a world like that of a tactical RPG? Yuuto, a Japanese young man and the protagonist of this story, dreamt such. Thusly, he was joyed when he really was sent to a different world and hired by a member of local royalty. However, he gradually learns. He learns the meaning of being in, instead of playing, a war, the heavy burden a strategist must endure… Turn-based tactical RPG Basic classes: Princess (heroine-only class) Fencer Heavy Infantry Thief Pirate Knight Griffin Rider Dark Griffin Archer Nomad Mage Priest Acolyte Shaman Can change to higher classes by using special items. 　8 kinds of weapons Sword, Spear, Ax, Bow, Staff, Magic (Nature, Light, Darkness) Approximately 20 hours to reach the ending. The difficulty level can be selected from Easy, Normal, and Hard to accommodate both those who want to enjoy the story and those who seek a challenge. Easy level, which doubles the experience points gain, is recommended for those want to enjoy the story. Done by: kaika Event CG: more than 10 Character CG: more than 30 Facial variations: more than 300 Done by: OPAI Done by: Todosakoku, Horiayu, Mani, Hon Full voice acting (everyone except the protagonist speaks). Done by: ayato sound create Glossary Scene Recollection Gallery Sound Room The game may not start if the memory of the personal computer is insufficient. The application may not function unless a Japanese language pack is set properly in your PC / the System Locale is set to Japanese.
